abstract: CBS remained No. 1 in the ratings on Thursday, its fourth consecutive victory on the night during the November “sweeps” period.
snippet: CBS remained No. 1 in the ratings on Thursday, its fourth consecutive victory on the night during the November “sweeps” period.
lead_paragraph: CBS remained No. 1 in the ratings on Thursday, its fourth consecutive victory on the night during the November “sweeps” period. According to Nielsen’s estimates, “CSI” earned CBS the night’s largest audience with 18.4 million viewers at 9 p.m. while CBS’s “Survivor: Gabon” at 8 p.m. (12.6 million) and “Eleventh Hour” at 10 p.m. (10.6 million) led their time slots as well.
